JOB DESCRIPTION: Senior Software Developer   Experienced Web Developers    ASP .Net / C# / SQL Server Developer   The developer role will involve a variety of tasks such as development of new components, enhancing existing functionality, and fixing issues across a variety of web-based projects. You will be working in a small, dynamic and agile team.   You will be working on the latest Microsoft web technologies such as ASP .NET 4.5.2, MVC, C#, LINQ, Entity Framework, JQuery, AJAX and SQL Server.    Required Skills     Commercial coding experience   2:1 or above degree in a technical area.   An attention to detail and an enthusiasm to take responsibility for all work and solutions produced.   Ability to meet challenging deadlines   Good problem solving and communication skill

EDUCATION.UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial, Any Graduate in Any Specialization, Diploma in Mechanical
